# NovaGenAI — llms.txt

> NovaGenAI Sdn. Bhd. (202501055020)
> Incorporated: 25 November 2025
> Website: https://novagenai.com.my
> Email: enquiries@novagenai.com.my

## About

NovaGenAI is an enterprise AI systems company headquartered in Cyberjaya, Malaysia. We design, build, and deploy production-grade AI systems for enterprises across Southeast Asia and beyond.

## Location

Suite 1-1, 1st Floor, Bio-X Centre, Persiaran Cyberpoint Selatan, Cyber 8, 63000 Cyberjaya, Selangor, Malaysia

## Leadership

- Don Calaki — Founder & CEO
- John Olino — CFO

## What We Do

- Autonomous AI Agents & Multi-Agent Orchestration
- LLM Engineering & Fine-Tuning
- In-Silico Training & Computational Biotech Intelligence
- Next-Generation Software Architecture
- Conversational Voice AI (AI Concierge Platform)
- Advanced Document Intelligence (RAG Pipelines)

## Key Products

- AI Concierge Platform — White-label enterprise voice AI with RAG document intelligence. Trilingual (English, Bahasa Malaysia, Mandarin). Deploy to any client in 5-7 days. First pilot: CryoCord (live March 2026).
- Custom Enterprise Software — AI-native business applications built from the ground up
- Computational Biology Models — Predictive cell viability and biotech intelligence systems

## Industries

- Enterprise AI
- Computational Biotech
- Healthcare AI
- Financial Services
- Manufacturing

## Technology Partners

NVIDIA (Inception Program Member), Google Cloud (Partner Network), AMD (AI Developer Program), Anthropic, OpenAI, ElevenLabs

## NVIDIA Ecosystem

Full-stack NVIDIA integration: NeMo, NIM, CUDA, TensorRT, Triton Inference Server, RAPIDS, DGX Spark. Cloud, on-premise, and hybrid deployments.

## Investors

MerakInvestments, CryoCord Group, Brighton Healthcare Group

## Company Size

6 employees. ML engineer joined February 2026. Currently raising $1M seed round.

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What is NovaGenAI?
A: NovaGenAI is an enterprise AI systems company based in Cyberjaya, Malaysia. We build and deploy production-grade AI systems including autonomous agents, LLM pipelines, voice AI, and computational biology models for enterprises across Asia-Pacific.

Q: What technology does NovaGenAI use?
A: We use the full NVIDIA AI stack (CUDA, TensorRT, Triton, NeMo, NIM, RAPIDS, DGX Spark) along with Google Cloud, Anthropic, OpenAI, and ElevenLabs. We support cloud, on-premise, and hybrid deployments.

Q: Does NovaGenAI deploy AI on-premise?
A: Yes. On-premise AI deployment is a core capability, using NVIDIA DGX Spark and custom GPU clusters for data sovereignty, PDPA compliance, and air-gapped security in regulated industries.

Q: What industries does NovaGenAI serve?
A: Healthcare/biotech, financial services, manufacturing, defence, and government — particularly regulated industries requiring data sovereignty.

Q: Who are NovaGenAI's investors?
A: MerakInvestments, CryoCord Group, and Brighton Healthcare Group. The company is raising a $1M seed round.

Q: What is NovaGenAI's AI Concierge Platform?
A: An enterprise voice AI system with RAG (retrieval-augmented generation) that handles customer interactions with natural conversation, real-time knowledge retrieval, and integration with business systems.

Q: What is multi-agent orchestration?
A: NovaGenAI's approach to coordinating multiple specialised AI agents working together on complex enterprise tasks — each agent has specific expertise and the orchestration layer manages task assignment and result synthesis.

Q: Does NovaGenAI work in computational biology?
A: Yes. We build models for predictive cell viability, multi-omics integration, in-silico training, and drug discovery pipelines using transformer architectures on biological data.

Q: Where is NovaGenAI located?
A: Cyberjaya, Malaysia — in the Bio-X Centre. We serve clients across Malaysia, Singapore, Australia, and the broader Asia-Pacific region.

Q: How can I work with NovaGenAI?
A: Contact enquiries@novagenai.com.my for a complimentary consultation. We'll assess your AI needs and propose a solution architecture.
